getUid().Description: Key of the bucket. Usually an app uid or one of the following special values: @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#UID_REMOVED_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#UID_TETHERING_E@ @B_android#os#Process#SYSTEM_UID_E@

getStartTimeStamp().Description: Start timestamp of the bucket's time interval. Defined in terms of "Unix time", see @B_java#lang#System#currentTimeMillis_E@.

getState().Description: Usage state. One of the following values: @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#STATE_ALL_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#STATE_DEFAULT_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#STATE_FOREGROUND_E@

getEndTimeStamp().Description: End timestamp of the bucket's time interval. Defined in terms of "Unix time", see @B_java#lang#System#currentTimeMillis_E@.

getRoaming().Description: Roaming state. One of the following values: @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#ROAMING_ALL_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#ROAMING_NO_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#ROAMING_YES_E@

getMetered().Description: Metered state. One of the following values: @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#METERED_ALL_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#METERED_NO_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#METERED_YES_E@ A network is classified as metered when the user is sensitive to heavy data usage on that connection. Apps may warn before using these networks for large downloads. The metered state can be set by the user within data usage network restrictions.

getRxBytes().Description: Number of bytes received during the bucket's time interval. Statistics are measured at the network layer, so they include both TCP and UDP usage.

getTxPackets().Description: Number of packets transmitted during the bucket's time interval. Statistics are measured at the network layer, so they include both TCP and UDP usage.

getRxPackets().Description: Number of packets received during the bucket's time interval. Statistics are measured at the network layer, so they include both TCP and UDP usage.

getTxBytes().Description: Number of bytes transmitted during the bucket's time interval. Statistics are measured at the network layer, so they include both TCP and UDP usage.

getDefaultNetworkStatus().Description: Default network status. One of the following values: @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#DEFAULT_NETWORK_ALL_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#DEFAULT_NETWORK_NO_E@ @B_android#app#usage#NetworkStats#Bucket#DEFAULT_NETWORK_YES_E@

ClassDesc: Buckets are the smallest elements of a query result. As some dimensions of a result may be aggregated (e.g. time or state) some values may be equal across all buckets.
